text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly states, \"Report to local authority: They can issue enforcement notices under Environmental Protection Act 1990\" and later emphasizes, \"I'd recommend contacting your local council's environmental health team first\u2014this is often the most practical route.\" This directly addresses the requirement to outline that the user can complain to the Kensington Council regarding the noise levels.", "criterion_id": "0512a99d-803f-4f44-8c5e-b74f4729d06a"}
